main.name: Ossiel Romero
main.bio: My name is Ossiel. I am Mexican but currently living & working in Vancouver, Canada. I like to live the typical Vancouver Lifestyle, which consists of solving problems during the week & hiking, and exploring on the weekends.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: I have many tools & techniques in my digital toolbelt, these are the ones I have used recently are

education.description: Studied Aviation Management and Communications. I learned administrative administrative methodologies, communication, and team management.

work.title: Consultant
work.description: Worked for over a decade as a consultant providing various IT services and support for individual clients.

work.title: Support
work.description: Worked alongside customer experience agents to ensure the IT needs of our clients. In this position I resolved customer related issues and provided personal tutoring per client.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
